name: Wolfiecraft
description:
This game was brought to you by Credible Steve. So, if you find any bugs, feel free to go report them there.

Current Version
v1.1: Game just came out with limited features.    

Mobs: Bat, Wraith, Poison Bat

UI Features: Inventory, Shop, Coin Bank, Level System

Game Features: Expanding randomly generated map, chests to loot, grass destruction for hearts, upgradable healing totem,  spells, crystal hearts to increase max HP, spawn point setting

Disclaimer
Do note that this game is not a finished product. Gameplay may change and old save files may not be compatible with new ones. You have been warned.
This game may fall under the category of games with violent elements.

Credits
Special thanks to Heartbeast's MIT licensed resources on Github
Thanks to SoundBible for providing sound effects for the public domain.
